Classic Kruger National Park Safari Packages

Experience Kruger National Park like never before with our privately guided standard safari packages. Although you take care of your own meals, we provide everything else you need for an unforgettable Kruger safari experience. Enjoy expertly guided safaris, rustic Kruger accommodations and unforgettable wildlife encounters. Book your safari today!

Why Choose a Kruger National Park Classic Safari Package?

Kruger National Park is a place where you can truly immerse yourself in its vast wilderness. It’s home to the famous Big Five, boasts over 500 bird species, and showcases a diversity of breathtaking landscapes. With our Kruger National Park Classic Packages, you still get the full safari experience — just with more flexibility and at a better price, by excluding meals.

Here's what sets our Classic Kruger packages apart:

  • Fully Private Safaris – No shared vehicles. It’s just you, your guide, and the wild.
  • Flexible Itineraries – Choose full-day or split-day game drives to suit your pace.
  • Comfy Accommodation – Stay inside the park in authentic Kruger rest camps.
  • Seamless Travel – Pickup from Nelspruit or East Gate Airport with all park fees covered.

With our personalized service, local expertise, and exceptional value, these packages are ideal for travelers who prefer more freedom over their dining choices while still enjoying an immersive Kruger safari.

Leopard walking in tall grass.

What's Included in Our Classic Kruger National Park Safari Packages?

We've designed our Classic Packages to include everything you need for a comfortable, independent, and enriching Kruger experience — while leaving meals up to you.

  • Private guided game drives (morning, afternoon, or full-day)
  • Park entrance fees and conservation levies
  • Accommodation inside Kruger National Park
  • Daily bottled water, coffee, and tea
  • Nearby airport or hotel pickup and drop-off
  • Flexible pacing and custom itinerary options
  • Birdwatching and photography opportunities on request

Note: Meals are not included in these packages. All Kruger rest camps have on-site restaurants and shops, so you can dine at your leisure and according to your own preferences.

Learn more about Kruger accommodation

Old Cape Buffalo with Red-Billed Oxpeckers on back.

What Makes Our Classic Kruger National Park Safaris Special?

Unlike many tour operators running on rigid schedules with packed group vehicles, we specialize in private, flexible, and personalized safari experiences. Want to linger longer at a leopard sighting? No problem — it's your safari, your pace. You'll be guided by a knowledgeable local professional who understands animal behavior, birdlife, and the rhythms of the bush.

Staying inside Kruger Park means you'll be among the first on the roads each morning and can enjoy the wild atmosphere deep into the evening. Whether you're a couple, a family, or a group of friends, your itinerary is fully tailored to your interests.

Kudus moving back into dense vegetation after drink from Sabie River

When to Visit Kruger National Park

Kruger is incredible all year round, and each season offers something special. We'll help you decide when to travel based on what you want to see most.

Dry Season (May to September)

This is the classic safari season. With sparse vegetation and animals gathering at waterholes, it's perfect for Big Five sightings and predator action. Cool mornings and golden evening light also make for amazing photos.

Green Season (October to April)

After the rains, the park transforms into a lush paradise alive with birdsong, babies, and blooming flowers. It's ideal for birders, photographers, and travelers who love nature's vibrant, dramatic beauty — plus, the camps are quieter and rates more affordable.

Learn more about Kruger National Park's weather

Lioness in tall grass next to the road.

Booking and Customising Your Classic Kruger National Park Safari

Booking your Kruger adventure is simple. Our team will help with all the logistics and tailor your trip around your needs. Want to extend your stay, explore the Panorama Route, or celebrate something special? Just say the word — we'll handle the rest.
